content:
Halyk Bank - Q1 2024 Financial Statement

BALANCE SHEET HIGHLIGHTS:
- Total Assets: 10500.00 billion KZT (growth: 0.0% YTD)
- Loans Portfolio: 6229.58 billion KZT (59.3% of total assets)
- Customer Deposits: 7686.25 billion KZT (73.2% of total assets)

INCOME STATEMENT:
- Net Profit: 172.93 billion KZT
- Return on Equity (ROE): 13.72%
- Return on Assets (ROA): 1.65%
- Net Interest Margin: 5.94%

CAPITAL & RISK METRICS:
- Capital Adequacy Ratio: 21.08% (Basel III requirement: 12.5%)
- Tier 1 Capital Ratio: 17.29%
- Non-Performing Loans (NPL) Ratio: 3.81%
- Loan Loss Coverage: 107.0%
- Cost-to-Income Ratio: 38.1%

LIQUIDITY:
- Liquidity Coverage Ratio (LCR): 168.7%
- Net Stable Funding Ratio (NSFR): 113.5%
- Loan-to-Deposit Ratio: 81.0%

The bank maintains strong capital buffers and healthy liquidity positions, demonstrating robust financial health in Q1 2024.

Halyk Bank - Q1 2024 Operational Metrics

NETWORK INFRASTRUCTURE:
- Total Branches: 551 locations nationwide
- ATM Network: 1653 machines
- Self-Service Terminals: 1760
- Employee Count: 12,122 professionals

CLIENT BASE:
- Total Active Clients: 2,694,915 customers
- Digital Banking Users: 1,616,949 (60.0% digitalization rate)
- New Clients This Quarter: 72,588
- Corporate Clients: 134,745
- Retail Clients: 2,560,169

DIGITAL BANKING PERFORMANCE:
- Mobile App Downloads: 1373511
- Active Mobile Users: 1,132,974
- Online Transactions Volume: 9.8 million transactions
- Digital Transaction Share: 78.4% of all transactions
- Average Mobile App Rating: 4.5/5.0

PRODUCT PENETRATION:
- Cards Issued: 3,539,854 total cards
- Credit Cards: 1,228,391
- Debit Cards: 3,165,486
- Active Loan Accounts: 529,500
- Deposit Accounts: 2,381,661

EFFICIENCY METRICS:
- Transactions per Employee: 380 per day
- Average Service Time: 3.5 minutes
- Customer Satisfaction Score (NPS): 62
- Employee Productivity Index: 92.4%

Halyk Bank continues to expand its digital capabilities while maintaining a strong physical presence across Kazakhstan.

Halyk Bank - Q1 2024 Market Analysis & Strategic Overview

MARKET POSITION:
- Market Share by Assets: 22.01%
- Market Share by Loans: 20.16%
- Market Share by Deposits: 22.34%
- Ranking in Kazakhstan: #1

YEAR-OVER-YEAR COMPARISON:
- Asset Growth YoY: 12.8%
- Loan Portfolio Growth YoY: 12.7%
- Deposit Growth YoY: 11.2%
- Net Profit Growth YoY: 20.8%
- Client Base Growth YoY: 9.3%

COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGES:
- Largest branch network nationwide with comprehensive coverage
- Strong capital position exceeding regulatory requirements
- Diversified loan portfolio across retail and corporate segments
- Advanced risk management systems
- High customer satisfaction and retention rates
- Trusted brand with 25+ years of market presence

BUSINESS SEGMENTS PERFORMANCE:
Retail Banking:
- Segment Profit: 74.14 billion KZT
- Loans Outstanding: 3717.23 billion KZT
- Customer Deposits: 4705.97 billion KZT

Corporate Banking:
- Segment Profit: 49.56 billion KZT
- Loans Outstanding: 2388.74 billion KZT
- Customer Deposits: 2282.54 billion KZT

SME Banking:
- Segment Profit: 26.47 billion KZT
- Loans Outstanding: 356.10 billion KZT
- Active SME Clients: 313,276

STRATEGIC INITIATIVES Q1 2024:
- Network optimization and digital transformation
- Enhanced cybersecurity and fraud prevention systems
- Customer experience improvement across all channels
- Sustainable finance and ESG integration
- Partnership expansion with fintech companies

RISK MANAGEMENT OVERVIEW:
- Credit Risk: Well-diversified portfolio with prudent underwriting
- Market Risk: Limited exposure, effective hedging strategies
- Operational Risk: Robust controls and business continuity plans
- Compliance: Full adherence to Basel III and local regulations

OUTLOOK:
Halyk Bank is well-positioned for continued growth in the Kazakhstani banking market, supported by strong fundamentals, 
digital innovation, and commitment to customer value creation.
